parameter.name: handlerSDS
parameter.description: Defines an alternative SDS archive handler. This is the name of an RecordStream interface that can be loaded via a plugin. If not given, an internal implementation will be used.

parameter.name: filebase
parameter.description: The filebase of the SDS archive. If an alternative archive handler is defined by "handlerSDS", this value serves as input to setSource().

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The server port for Arclink connections. -1 deactivates the Arclink server. The standard Arclink port is 18001.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The server port for FDSNWS connections. -1 deactivates the FDSN Web server.

parameter.name: baseURL
parameter.description: The base URL of the FDSN Web service that is given in the WADL document.

parameter.name: maxTimeWindow
parameter.description: The aggregated maximum time window (seconds) for all requested streams. A value of 0 will deactive any restriction.
